me_self: You run your head into a brick wall.  OUCH!
actor_room: $n charges into the fray!  All guts, no brains.
actor_self: $n bends down, points two fingers out from $s head, and begins running around in circles.
actor_other: $n ducks down low, charges forward, and head-butts $N!
actor_me: OOF!  $n rammed $s head into your stomach!  That HURT.
